alert.note: Alert for Washtenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 24 at 3:15AM EDT until August 24 at 4:15AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: The National Weather Service in Detroit/Pontiac has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Washtenaw County in southeastern Michigan... * Until 415 AM EDT. * At 314 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ypsilanti, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Willis around 325 AM EDT. Milan around 330 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Hudson Mills, Pittsfield Township, Delhi Mills, Whittaker, Barton Hills and Hudson Mills Metropark. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
